name: The Cookie Club
description:
Welcome to the Cookie Club Roleplay Game! You will need a code from discord to play and get help with the game. The game is only for fans / friends of Luna Midori (Streamer on twitch) - https://www.twitch.tv/luna_midori5

For those wanting their own player into the game. Request on discord and I will add them in the weekly update. Please make a new save each update for now. As all new apis are being used and you will bug out if you don't...

THE WEB VER IS THE DEMO download is the full game!!

Chat with Luna on discord for help / more info
